EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners (1316094081.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi John,
I have not heard anything from Marstel Day at this point. I will send a follow up email requesting a status update on where they are in reviewing our MSA. Please let me know if there is any other action you would like for me to take or if you have any additional information.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: John Fittipaldi [mailto:johnfitti@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, September 15, 2011 8:19 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Fw: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Nicolette,
I just wanted to check in on the status of the MBO agreement with Marstel Day. Where do we stand?
Thanks,
John
----- Forwarded Message ----- From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: Julie Macdonald Winbush <jmacdonald@marstel-day.com> Cc: John Fittipaldi <johnfitti@yahoo.com> Sent: Wednesday, September 7, 2011 4:36 PM Subject: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners Hi Julie,
On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. John mentioned to me that you are familiar with the MBO Partners program due to your past work with Booz Allen, but if you have any questions about our program I would be happy to speak with you and you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here:
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Attached is the standard agreement we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
For more information on MBO Partners click here: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you.
Have a great day, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: John Fittipaldi [mailto:johnfitti@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, September 07, 2011 11:39 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Julie Macdonald Winbush Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
OK, I had a substantial conversation with Marstel Day this morning. It appears that they will want to establish a working consultative relationship with me.
Juli MacDonald Winbush will be the point of contact for Marstel Day with MBO Partners.
I've completed the enrollment process and signed the agreement. The proverbial ball is now in your court. Please advise if I can answer any questions that might arise.
Regards,
John
From: "ntaylor@mbopartners.com" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: johnfitti@yahoo.com Sent: Tuesday, September 6, 2011 6:03 PM Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear John, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become a MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. Please begin enrollment by clicking here. Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you.
